title: Creative Approval Update Webhook
description: Webhook payload sent by seller agent when the approval status of a creative changes for a specific media buy.

creative_set_id.description: The creative set containing the creative

creative_id.description: The creative whose approval status changed

media_buy_id.description: The media buy this approval applies to

seller_agent_url.description: URL of the seller agent making this notification

rejection_reason.description: Reason for rejection, required if status is 'rejected'
